meta.description: Lisburn Herald Lisburn, County Antrim Northern Ireland I read in your esteemed journal that a parent was fined [recently] at Crumlin Petty Sessions Court for noncompliance with the Vaccination (Ireland) Acts, 1863-1879.

title: LETTERS TO THE PRESS FROM CHRISTIAN SCIENCE COMMITTEES ON PUBLICATION / Christian Science Sentinel
